name: Supersonic Squirrel Basketball
description:
✅ Dedicated servers are currently online an running

Multigravitational basketball with squirrels!

Join your friends in a challenging 2vs2 Basketball matches between squirrels

Fast and direct Gameplay, with simple mechanics that you can expertise and compenetrate with your mates to become unbeatable

Supersonic Squirrel Basketball is a game created for Epic Mega Jam 2022.

"As above, so below" was the theme of the jam

GAME MODES

Online
Create or join an online game to play with your friends all around the world with AWS Gamelift dedicated servers!

You can create a match, and then share the game code to your mates

LAN
Connect with your friends on a local network. (It is also possible to connect over the internet by forwarding your router ports).

Freeplay
Improve your skills in practice mode (solo play). 

CONTROLS

Supersonic Squirrel Basketball can be played with gamepad, or  keyboard+mouse. 

Horizontal movement

  • Keyboard: AD
  • Gamepad: Left Joystick

Jump

  • Keyboard: Space
  • Gamepad: A button (Xbox mapping)

Cross floor (you can hold the key to cross the floor several times)

  • Keyboard: E
  • Gamepad: A button (Xbox mapping)

Throw the ball (with ball grabbed)

  • Mouse: Left Click
  • Gamepad: Right trigger

Dash  (without ball grabbed)

  • Mouse: Left Click
  • Gamepad: Right trigger
